testsuite Package¶

testsuite Package¶

jinja2.testsuite¶

All the unittests of Jinja2. These tests can be executed by either running run-tests.py using multiple Python versions at the same time.

copyright:
  1. 2010 by the Jinja Team.
license:

BSD, see LICENSE for more details.
class lib.jinja2.testsuite.JinjaTestCase(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: unittest.TestCase

setup()[source]¶
tearDown()[source]¶
